name: Boba Tea Dress Game
description:
"Welcome to the Yashashi Kawaii Boba Shop, a shop frequented by both animals and humans alike, sit down and make yourself your favorite boba! Don't be surprised if your drink captures the attention of one of the adorable creatures who waddle in the shop from time to time~"

===============================================================

"Oof, this is my first html game, so some of the stuff is a bit wonky (sticky buttons, some of the menus are kind of weird n' such), admittedly I shouldn't have started out with a game that has THIS many menus in it, I probably should have started with a simple drag n' drop (which is how most of my games will be like from now on if I make another one), but I'll still come back to this as my skills improve to clean it up a bit. i just thought since I made all the assets and stuff that I might as well have something to show for it, oof!"

Controls Mouse
  •  Click on the arrow buttons to browse through the choices
  • Click on the Camera Button on the lower right corner when you want to clear the screen to take a screenshot (either by using print screen, snip&clip, or whatever screenshot app/program you usually use)
  • Click the Lucky Cat on the shelf for a hard restart
Features
  • 14 Tea "Flavors" (Thai, Brown Sugar, Green Tea, Taro, Lychee, Milk tea, Peach, Strawberry, Strawberry-Banana, Mango, Blackberry, Blueberry, and Sunset)
  • 8 Boba "Flavors" (Tapioca, Mango, Lime, Green Apple, Orange, Strawberry, Passion Fruit, and Yogurt)
  • 16 Fruit addons (Strawberry, Blackberries, Blueberries,Mango, Pineapple, Lemon, Orange, Lime,  Raspberry,  and more..) 
  • 5 Pudding Flavors- (Flan, Vanilla, Chocolate-Vanilla Swirl, Vanilla-Chocolate, and Strawberry)
  • 10 Jelly Flavors- (Tri Color, Strawberry, Blueberry,Mango,Orange, Pineapple, Lemon, Green Apple, Lychee, and Coffee)
  • 3 Whip Cream Flavors- (Vanilla, Chocolate, and Strawberry)
  • 17 Extra Decorative items (Syrups, Sprinkles, Pocky, and Umbrellas)
  • 4 Cute Animal Friends ( Bunny, Pig, Deer, Kappa)
  • 10 Sweet Side- (  2 Fruit Sandwiches, Maroons, Cinnamon Rolls, Sweet Rolls, Mochi, Cheesecake, Princess Cake, Strawberry Shortcake, and Raspberry Cake!)

Credit
